DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/pipelines/.description: [DEPRECATED] Delete a pipeline. Use the new /pipelines/v1/pipelines endpoint instead.

schema.description: Specifies the public ID of the account.
Defines the name of the pipeline.

4XX.description: Indicates an error in deleting a pipeline.

schema.description: Specifies the public ID of the account.
Specifies the public ID of the pipeline.

4XX.description: Indicates an error in listing Pipelines.

schema.description: Specifies the public ID of the account.
Specifies the publid ID of the sink.
Delete sink forcefully, including deleting any dependent pipelines.

4XX.description: Indicates an error in listing Sinks.

schema.description: Delete stream forcefully, including deleting any dependent pipelines.
Specifies the public ID of the account.
Specifies the public ID of the stream.

4XX.description: Indicates an error in listing Streams.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/pipelines.description: [DEPRECATED] List, filter, and paginate pipelines in an account. Use the new /pipelines/v1/pipelines endpoint instead.

schema.description: Specifies the public ID of the account.
Specifies the prefix of pipeline name to search.
Specifies which page to retrieve.
Specifies the number of pipelines per page.

count.description: Indicates the number of items on current page.

per_page.description: Indicates the number of items per page.

total_count.description: Indicates the total number of items.

items.description: [DEPRECATED] Describes the configuration of a pipeline. Use the new streams/sinks/pipelines API instead.

max_bytes.description: Specifies rough maximum size of files.

max_duration_s.description: Specifies duration to wait to aggregate batches files.

max_rows.description: Specifies rough maximum number of rows per file.

type.description: Specifies the desired compression algorithm and format.

format.description: Specifies the format of data to deliver.

bucket.description: Specifies the R2 Bucket to store files.

filename.description: Specifies the name pattern to for individual data files.

filepath.description: Specifies the name pattern for directory.

prefix.description: Specifies the base directory within the bucket.

endpoint.description: Indicates the endpoint URL to send traffic.

name.description: Defines the name of the pipeline.

oneOf.description: [DEPRECATED] HTTP source configuration. Use the new streams API instead.

authentication.description: Specifies whether authentication is required to send to this pipeline via HTTP.

origins.description: Specifies allowed origins to allow Cross Origin HTTP Requests.

format.description: Specifies the format of source data.

oneOf.description: [DEPRECATED] Worker binding source configuration. Use the new streams API instead.

format.description: Specifies the format of source data.

version.description: Indicates the version number of last saved configuration.

success.description: Indicates whether the API call was successful.

allOf.description: Indicates whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: Indicates the error trying to list pipelines.
